title: Crusher in the Tushar Canceled Due to Wildfire; Life Time Grand Prix Pivots to Best Four of Six
content:
Grand Prix athletes will now be ranked on their best four of six results rather than five of seven.

Read the full article at Crusher in the Tushar Canceled Due to Wildfire; Life Time Grand Prix Pivots to Best Four of Six on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
